Plot: From extraordinary highs - patronage by the Medicis, friendship with Galileo and, most importantly of all, beautiful and outstandingly original paintings - to rape by her father's colleague, torture by the Inquisition, life-long struggles for acceptance by the artistic Establishment, and betrayal by the men she loved, Artemisia was a bold and brilliant woman who lived as she wanted, and paid a high price.
Characters: Galileo Galilei, Artemisia Gentileschi, Cosimo II de' Medici, Palmira Stiattesi, Pierantonio Stiattesi, Orazio Gentileschi, Graziella, Renata
Setting: Rome (Italy), Florence (Italy), Genoa (Italy), Naples (Italy) England Italy, Naples (Italy), England, Italy
